alert.note: Alert for Becker; Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 1:33PM CDT until July 10 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN OTTER TAIL AND SOUTHWESTERN BECKER COUNTIES... At 132 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Shoreham, or near Detroit Lakes, moving southeast at 25 mph. At 130 PM CDT, broadcast media reported ping-pong ball size hail near Little Cormorant Lake. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Vergas and Frazee around 145 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Big McDonald Lake, Dent and Perham. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If on or near any lakes in southern Becker and northern Otter Tail County, get away from the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 15 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
